meta_dataset.title: Meta Dataset
meta_dataset.description: The dataset root node in the metadata.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the dataset metadata.

node.title: Dataset
node.description: The main dataset node in the metadata structure.

type_name.title: Type Name
type_name.description: The type name of a dataset is 'dataset'.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: The attribute groups of a dataset. The 'data' group is mandatory.

contains.title: Data
contains.description: The data attributes group. Contains general attributes of the outer data object.

type_name.title: Type Name
type_name.description: The type name of each attribute group is 'list'.

value.title: Value
value.description: Each attribute group has a specific non-empty list of attributes as value. Here, the 'name' attribute is mandatory.

contains.title: Name
contains.description: The name of the defined dataset.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Attribute permissions object, governing access to its parent attribute.

read.title: Read
read.description: List of user/role uuids allowed to read the parent attribute (value & permissions).

write_permissions.title: Write Permissions
write_permissions.description: List of user/role uuids allowed to write the permissions of the parent attribute.

write_value.title: Write Value
write_value.description: List of user/role uuids allowed to modify the value of the parent attribute.

oneOf.description: The description of the defined dataset.
